issue.title: [JS] Revise bundles
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13303](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13303). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
- Use es2015 sources in the apache-arrow package since webpack 4 does not support esnext and many people still use it
- Generate .cjs and .mjs files instead of just .js to make it clear what the files are.
